allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$files = Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter ''*.html''; foreach ($file in $files) { $content = Get-Content -Path $file.FullName -Raw -Encoding UTF8; $content = $content -replace ''@\{/admin/'', ''@{/grap/admin/'' -replace ''@\{/user/'', ''@{/grap/user/'' -replace ''@\{/auth/'', ''@{/grap/auth/''; Set-Content -Path $file.FullName -Value $content -Encoding UTF8 -NoNewline }")
